page.title: 17 MAIN MEALS
page.content: These were the meals most likely to occur during a fortnightly period in the homes of 29 children: Roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes, carrots and cabbage.....28 Fish and chips....................19 Egg, sausage and chips............19 Beefburger and chips..............18 Fish fingers and chips............17 Sausage and chips.................15 Beans on toast....................15 Scrambled egg on toast............15 Pizza and chips...................14 Spaghetti Bolognaise..............14 Cornish pastie....................14 Steak and kidney pie and chips....13 Chicken pie and chips.............11 Omelette..........................11 Bacon, beans and chips............ 9 Shepherd's pie.................... 9 Chinese take-away................. 9 Scampi and chips.................. 9
